com.radog.sdk.gatt

Class RadogGatt

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radog.sdk.gatt.RadogGatt

  • public class RadogGatt
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides Radog GATT functionality to enable communication with Radog devices.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  RadogGatt.ConnectionCallback
      Callback indicating the result of the connect operation.
      static interface  RadogGatt.WriteCallback
      Callback indicating the result of a characteristic write operation.

        public void writeMajor(int major,
              RadogGatt.WriteCallback writeCallback)
        Write the major value to the associated beacon device.
        Parameters:
        major - Major value to write
        writeCallback - Callback handler that will receive result.

      • writeMinor

        public void writeMinor(int minor,
              RadogGatt.WriteCallback writeCallback)
        Write the minor value to the associated beacon device.
        Parameters:
        minor - Minor value to write
        writeCallback - Callback handler that will receive result.

      • writeAdvertisingInterval

        public void writeAdvertisingInterval(int interval,
                            RadogGatt.WriteCallback writeCallback)
        Write the advertising interval to the associated beacon device. Allowed advertising interval: 50, 100, 200, 500, 1000, 2000, 5000 (in mills)
        Parameters:
        interval - Advertising interval to write
        writeCallback - Callback handler that will receive result.

      • writeTxPower

        public void writeTxPower(int txPower,
                RadogGatt.WriteCallback writeCallback)
        Write the txpower value to the associated beacon device. Allowed txpower values: -23, -19, -16, -12, -9, -5, 0, 4.
        Parameters:
        txPower - Txpower value to write
        writeCallback - Callback handler that will receive result.
